phrases.phrase: <title>Advanced Buttons 1</title><info>Here you can define what tools you want to be displayed on the first row of buttons.</info>
<title>Advanced Buttons 2</title><info>Here you can define what tools you want to be displayed on the second row of buttons.</info>
<title>Advanced Buttons 3</title><info>Here you can define what tools you want to be displayed on the third row of buttons.</info>
<title>Toolbar Location</title><info>This option enables you to specify where the toolbar should be located. This option can be set to "top" or "bottom" (the default) or "external".</info>
<title>Toolbar Alignment</title><info>This option enables you to specify the alignment of the toolbar, this value can be "left", "right" or "center" (the default).</info>
<title>Plugins</title><info>This option should contain a comma separated list of plugins.</info>
<title>Load TinyMCE on Controllers</title><info>Define where we should load TinyMCE.</info>
